function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of fully pandemic-resilient indicators in green building certification systems","Impact":"Potential for insufficient health and safety measures in residential buildings during and after pandemics","Mitigation":"Adoption of necessary changes to existing green building certification systems and development of new standards","Technologies":"Advanced building materials, air filtration systems, and smart ventilation systems","People":"Residents of residential buildings","Owner":"Green building certification organizations"},{"Description":"Limited response to waste and wastewater management in assessment systems","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and environmental contamination","Mitigation":"Integration of waste management and wastewater treatment systems into existing green building certification standards","Technologies":"Waste segregation systems, wastewater treatment plants, and sustainable recycling programs","People":"Residents of residential buildings, environmental stakeholders","Owner":"Building developers, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Limited focus on economic sustainability in green building certification systems","Impact":"Potential challenges in realizing pandemic-resilient indicators due to economic constraints","Mitigation":"Integration of economic sustainability criteria into green building certification systems, promotion of cost-effective solutions for pandemic resilience","Technologies":"Energy-efficient systems, sustainable building materials, and green technology innovations","People":"Residents of residential buildings, building developers, economic stakeholders","Owner":"Green building certification organizations"}]}
